skill.name: Hammer of the Ancients
skill.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

Call forth a massive hammer to smash enemies directly in front of you for 535% weapon damage. Hammer of the Ancients has a 1% increased Critical Hit Chance for every 5 Fury that you have.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Call down a mystical hammer and smash groups of enemies.

rune.name: Smash
rune.description: Smash for 640% weapon damage as Fire.

skill.name: Furious Charge
skill.description:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Rush forward knocking back and dealing 360% weapon damage to enemies along your path.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charge all enemies in your path and knock them back.

rune.name: Merciless Assault
rune.description: Cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds for every enemy hit. This effect can reduce the cooldown by up to 10 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Each enemy charged reduces the cooldown of Furious Charge.

skill.name: War Cry
skill.description:
Generate: 20 Fury
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Unleash a rallying cry to increase Armor for you and all allies within 50 yards by 20% for 60 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 20 Fury
Cooldown: 20 seconds

A rallying cry increases Armor for you and your allies for 60 seconds.

rune.name: Invigorate
rune.description: Increase maximum Life by 10% and Life regeneration by 8253 per second while affected by War Cry.
rune.simpleDescription: Increase your maximum Life and Life regeneration while affected by War Cry.

skill.name: Battle Rage
skill.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

Enter a rage which increases your damage by 10% and Critical Hit Chance by 3%. Lasts 120 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Unleash your inner rage, increasing your damage and Critical Hit Chance. Lasts 120 seconds.

rune.name: Bloodshed
rune.description: Critical Hits cause an explosion of blood dealing 20% of the damage done to all other nearby enemies.
rune.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause the enemy to explode, damaging nearby enemies.

skill.name: Overpower
skill.description:
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Deal 380% weapon damage to all enemies within 9 yards.

Critical Hits have a chance to reduce the cooldown of Overpower by 1 second.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Unleash a devastating attack against nearby enemies.

The cooldown of Overpower is reduced when you land Critical Hits.

rune.name: Revel
rune.description: Increase damage to 760% weapon damage as Fire.

skill.name: Threatening Shout
skill.description:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Shout with great ferocity, reducing damage done by enemies within 25 yards by 20% for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Strike fear in your enemies and make their attacks do less damage.

rune.name: Demoralize
rune.description: Affected enemies are also taunted to attack you for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Superstition
skill.description: Reduce all non-Physical damage by 20%. When you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack, you have a chance to gain 2 Fury.
skill.flavor: "The sorcery of the west has brought us nothing but blight. Strength built these walls, and strength will hold them." —Gruchac Hammerhand

skill.name: Brawler
skill.description: As long as there are 3 enemies within 12 yards, all of your damage is increased by 20%.
skill.flavor: "I have two blades, one for each of you." —Blademaster Kharne

skill.name: Unforgiving
skill.description: You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you generate 2 Fury every 1 seconds.
skill.flavor: "It was as if he suddenly came to know every grievous injury endured by his ancestors, and he had selected that very moment to exact their collective revenge." —Chronicler Arlavoc

skill.name: Bloodthirst
skill.description:
Each point of Fury spent heals you for 578 Life.

Heal amount is increased by 1% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.
skill.flavor: "Compassion is weakness. To press the advantage when an opponent calls for mercy is the way of true power." —Halaberd the Conqueror

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 148548 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 4952 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.8 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to targets within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun targets for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stuns enemies.

skill.name: Hysteria
skill.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 3% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Missile Ward
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
skill.simpleDescription: Reduces damage from ranged attacks for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Erosion
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals damage and causes affected enemies to take additional damage.

skill.name: Focused Mind
skill.description: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
skill.simpleDescription: An aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress.
